tool_description: Analyzes the compatibility of multiple fibers for blending, comparing care requirements, shrinkage rates, and working properties.

primary_fiber.description: Main fiber type for the blend

secondary_fibers.description: Additional fibers to blend with primary

blend_percentages.description: Percentage of each fiber in blend (must sum to 100)

intended_application.description: How the blend will be used (garment, accessory, home_textile, craft_project)

error_messages: Percentage mismatch: Blend percentages must sum to exactly 100.
Array length mismatch: Number of blend_percentages must equal 1 (for primary) + number of secondary_fibers.
Invalid fiber combination: Some fiber combinations are not recommended due to incompatible care requirements or properties.
Unsupported application: Intended application must be one of: garment, accessory, home_textile, or craft_project.
usage: Specify primary_fiber, secondary_fibers array, and corresponding blend_percentages that sum to 100. Indicate intended_application for context-appropriate compatibility analysis.

care_compatibility.description: Assessment of care requirement compatibility (excellent, good, fair, poor)

shrinkage_risk.description: Risk of differential shrinkage (low, medium, high)

working_properties.description: How the blend will handle during crafting

recommended_blend.description: Whether this blend is recommended for the intended use

potential_issues.description: List of potential problems with this fiber combination
